    • Method Detail

      • digest

        public static byte[] digest(java.io.File file)
                     throws java.io.IOException,
                            java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Digests a file using SHA-256
        Parameters:
        file - The file to be digested
        Returns:
        SHA-256 hash
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the file doesn't exist or couldn't be read
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - If SHA-256 wasn't found on the system

      • digestMultiple

        public static byte[] digestMultiple(byte[]... values)
                             throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Digests multiple byte arrays and returns the final SHA-256 hash
        Parameters:
        values - Byte arrays to be digested
        Returns:
        Final SHA-256 hash
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - If SHA-256 wasn't found on the system

      • merkleRoot

        public static byte[] merkleRoot(java.io.File rootDir)
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Calculates the merkle root of all files in rootDir
        Parameters:
        rootDir - The root directory for the merkle root calculation
        Returns:
        The SHA-256 merkle root hash
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If any file operation fails
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - If SHA-256 wasn't found on the system

      • merkleRoot

        public static byte[] merkleRoot(java.io.File rootDir,
                                java.io.FileFilter fileFilter)
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Calculates the merkle root of all files in rootDir which pass the fileFilter
        Parameters:
        rootDir - The root directory for the merkle root calculation
        fileFilter - Only files which pass the filtration will be added to the merkle root
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If any file operation fails
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - If SHA-256 wasn't found on the system
